text: The Cadillac Catera is a mid-size luxury Sedan made by Cadillac from 1996 to 2001. == History and Features == The Cadillac Catera was previewed by the Cadillac LSE concept at the Detroit Auto Show in 1994 then at the Detroit Montreal Vancouver and Toronto auto shows a early-production model was shown in 1996. Cadillac later began selling the Catera in the United States in 1996 as a 1997 model the Catera was a rebadged Opel Omega being sold as Cadillac's entry-level model that targeted young buyers. It has a 3.0 liter V6 engine with a 4-speed automatic transmission it was improved in 2000. == Markets == The Cadillac Catera was sold mainly in The American market but also in Canada and Middle East. == Discontinuation == The Cadillac Catera was discontinued in 2001 due to weak sales and marketing campaign that didint reach young buyers it was later replaced by the Cadillac CTS. == References == Catera Category:1990s automobiles Category:2000s automobiles Category:Sedans
title: Cadillac Catera
